institution-wrap.institution: Foundation for the National Institutes of Health

award-group.award-id: UNC Center for AIDS Research (P30 AI 050410)

funding-group.funding-statement: This research was supported by grant R34 MH 116806 and R00 MH 112413 from the National Institute of Mental health (NIMH) and by a developmental grant from the UNC Center for AIDS Research (CFAR), an NIH-funded program (P30 AI 050410). This work was also supported by the Fogarty International Center through the Malawi HIV implementation research scientist training program (D43- D43TW010060). This paper does not reflect the views of the NIMH, NIH, or Fogarty.
